prompt.task: Task: Generate a professional cover letter using the information below.
prompt.context: Context: This is for a job application. Create a formal, well-structured cover letter that highlights the candidate's relevant experience and demonstrates their enthusiasm for the role.
prompt.format_item1: Start with a proper date and address block
prompt.format_item5: Include full contact information in the signature
prompt.name: Name
prompt.note_item1: Focus on matching candidate's experience with job requirements
prompt.note_item2: Maintain a professional yet enthusiastic tone
prompt.note_item3: Be specific about contributions and achievements
prompt.note_item4: Express genuine interest in the role and company
prompt.note_item5: Keep the letter concise and impactful
prompt.final_instruction: Please generate a complete cover letter using this information.
prompt.instruction_text: Use bullet points to structure the content

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This cookie policy explains how CVATI ("we", "our", or "us") uses cookies and similar technologies on our website and application. By using CVATI, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.

what.title: What are cookies?
what.desc: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile) when you visit websites. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently, provide a better user experience, and give information to the website owners. Cookies cannot harm your device or access other information on your device.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.desc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

preferences.title: Preference cookies
preferences.desc: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your language preference or your dark/light mode setting) and provide enhanced, more personal features.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.desc: These cookies collect information about how you use our website, which pages you visited and which links you clicked on. All of the data is anonymized and cannot be used to identify you.

functional.title: Functional cookies
functional.desc: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we have added to our pages.
functional.examples: Examples: Chat service cookies, saved form data

thirdParty.title: Third-party cookies
thirdParty.desc: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We use services from the following third parties that may use cookies:
thirdParty.analytics: Google analytics - for website usage analysis
thirdParty.cloudinary: Cloudinary - for image storage and processing
thirdParty.oauth: OAuth providers (if you use social login)

manage.title: Managing cookies
manage.desc: Most web browsers allow you to manage your cookie preferences. You can set your browser to refuse cookies, or to alert you when cookies are being sent. The methods for doing so vary from browser to browser, and from version to version.
manage.links: Here are links to cookie management instructions for common browsers:
manage.note: Please note that restricting cookies may impact the functionality of our website. For example, you may not be able to use all the interactive features of our site or save your preferences between visits.

similar.title: Similar technologies
similar.desc: In addition to cookies, we may use other similar technologies to store and access data on your device:
similar.storageDesc: We use browser local storage to save your preferences and improve performance.
similar.sessionDesc: Similar to local storage but clears when you close your browser.

updates.title: Updates to this policy
updates.desc: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, regulation, or our business practices. Any changes will be posted on this page and, if the changes are significant, we will provide a more prominent notice.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.desc: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us at:

cookies.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.

testimonials.content2: The cover letter generator is amazing! It perfectly captured my experience and the tone I was looking for. Saved me hours of work.
testimonials.content3: After struggling to get callbacks, I revamped my resume with CVATI and started getting interview requests within days.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Clear terms for using CVati. Your rights, our responsibilities, and what to expect.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing and using CVati, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

no_signup.title: No Registration Required
no_signup.description: CVati operates on a no-signup model. You can use all core features immediately without creating an account. Cloud storage connection is optional and user-controlled.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.lawful_use: Use the service for lawful purposes only
responsibilities.accurate_info: Provide accurate information in your CVs
responsibilities.no_harmful_content: Do not upload harmful or offensive content
responsibilities.no_reverse_engineering: Reverse engineering or copying the service
responsibilities.no_malicious_use: Using the service for malicious purposes

ownership.title: Your Data Ownership
ownership.description: You retain full ownership and control of all content you create using CVati. We do not claim any rights to your CV content, personal information, or uploaded materials.

local_storage.title: Local Storage
local_storage.description: Data stored locally remains on your device and is not transmitted to our servers.

cloud_storage.title: Cloud Storage
cloud_storage.description: Cloud storage is optional and uses your own Google Drive account with revocable permissions.

uptime.title: Service Uptime
uptime.description: We strive to maintain high service availability but cannot guarantee 100% uptime. Scheduled maintenance will be announced in advance when possible.

local_functionality.title: Local Functionality
local_functionality.description: Core CV building features work locally on your device and do not require internet connectivity. Cloud features require internet access.

warranty.title: No Warranty
warranty.description: CVati is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee that the service will be error-free, secure, or continuously available.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use our service.

third_party.title: Third-Party Services
third_party.description: Integration with third-party services (like Google Drive) is subject to their terms and availability.

service_changes.title: Service Changes
service_changes.description: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the service at any time. We will provide reasonable notice of significant changes when possible.

terms_changes.title: Terms Changes
terms_changes.description: These terms may be updated from time to time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

by_user.title: Termination by You
by_user.description: You may stop using the service at any time. Your locally stored data remains on your device. You can revoke cloud storage permissions independently.

by_us.title: Termination by Us
by_us.description: We may restrict access if terms are violated. We will provide notice when possible and reasonable time to retrieve your data.

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.description: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes will be resolved through appropriate legal channels.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using CVati, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
acceptance.effective: These terms are effective immediately upon your use of the service

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy matters. Learn how we handle your data with transparency and care.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to CVati. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our CV/resume building application and services. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the application.

collection.title: Information We Collect

personal.title: Personal Information You Provide
personal.description: When you use our Service, we may collect the following personal information that you voluntarily provide:

collection.analytics: Usage analytics and application performance data
collection.local_storage: Local storage data for offline functionality

local.title: Local Storage (Default)
local.device_only: Data stays on your device only
local.no_transmission: No data transmission to our servers

cloud.title: Cloud Storage (Optional)
cloud.encrypted: Data encrypted in transit and at rest

sharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure

no_selling.title: We Do Not Sell Your Data
no_selling.description: We never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties. Your CV data remains private and under your control.

sharing.legal_compliance: Legal compliance when required by law
sharing.security_protection: Protection of our rights and security

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: All data transmission uses HTTPS encryption

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

cookies2.title: Cookie Policy
cookies2.subtitle: Learn about how CVati uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience.
cookies2.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.

what_are.title: What Are Cookies?
what_are.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

how_work.title: How They Work
how_work.description: Cookies store information about your visit and can recognize you when you return to the website.

your_control.title: Your Control
your_control.description: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings at any time.

minimal_approach.title: Minimal Cookie Approach
minimal_approach.description: CVati follows a privacy-first approach and uses minimal cookies. Most functionality works without cookies, and we only use them when necessary for core features.

analytics.title: Analytics (Optional)
analytics.usage: Understanding how the app is used

essential.title: Essential Cookies (Required)
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.

session.title: Session Cookies
session.description: Maintain your session while using the app

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Remember your settings like dark mode

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Optional)
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how you use our website so we can improve it.

usage.title: Usage Analytics
usage.description: Track which features are used most

marketing.title: Marketing/Advertising Cookies
marketing.description: CVati does not use marketing or advertising cookies. We do not track you for advertising purposes or share data with advertisers.

third_party.title: Third-Party Services
third_party.description: When you choose to connect optional services, they may set their own cookies:

google_drive.title: Google Drive Integration
google_drive.description: When you connect Google Drive, Google may set cookies according to their privacy policy.

analytics_service.title: Analytics Service
analytics_service.description: If enabled, our analytics provider may set cookies to track usage patterns.

banner_choice.title: Cookie Banner
banner_choice.description: Accept or decline optional cookies when you first visit CVati.

browser_settings.title: Browser Settings
browser_settings.description: Control cookies through your browser settings - block, delete, or manage all cookies.

browsers.mobile: Manage cookies in mobile browser settings

essential_disabled.title: If Essential Cookies Are Disabled
essential_disabled.sessions: Session management may not work properly
essential_disabled.preferences: Your preferences (dark mode, language) won't be saved
essential_disabled.cloud_sync: Cloud storage sync may be affected

analytics_disabled.title: If Analytics Cookies Are Disabled
analytics_disabled.improvements: We can't gather insights to improve the app
analytics_disabled.issues: Harder to identify and fix technical issues

contact.title: Questions About Cookies?
contact.description: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us:

updates.title: Cookie Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

cloud3.save_cvs_securely_google: Save your CVs securely to Google drive
cloud3.save_cvs_securely_dropbox: Save your CVs securely to Dropbox
cloud3.save_cvs_securely_onedrive: Save your CVs securely to OneDrive
cloud3.never_access_files: Your CVs are saved directly to your Cloud- we never access your files
cloud3.description_multi: Manage your AI-generated cover letters from all sources
cloud3.connect_storage_to_save: Connect cloud storage to save and access your AI-generated cover letters
cloud3.tip_connect_providers: Tip: Connect cloud providers to sync your cover letters across devices!
cloud3.tip_create_first: Tip: Generate your first cover letter using AI to get started!
cloud3.onedrive_benefits: Reliable Microsoft cloud storage with Office integration
cloud3.save_locally_description: Save your CV to your device's storage
cloud3.failed_load_cv: Failed to load CV from provider
cloud3.failed_load_cv_retry: Failed to load CV. Please try again.
cloud3.text_too_short: Extracted text is too short. Please ensure the file contains meaningful content.
cloud3.file_process_failed: Failed to process file. Please try again or paste text directly.
cloud3.select_cv_or_upload: Please select a CV or upload a file
cloud3.fill_required_fields: Please fill in all required fields
cloud3.cv_not_loaded: CV data not loaded. Please select the CV again.
cloud3.cover_letter_preview: Your AI-generated cover letter will appear here
cloud3.file_processed_success: âœ… File processed successfully: "{fileName}". {wordCount} words extracted. Ready to analyze!
cloud3.job_desc_too_short: Job description must be at least 10 characters
cloud3.select_saved_resume: Please select a resume from your saved resumes
cloud3.how_submit_resume: How would you like to submit your resume?
cloud3.create_first_resume: Create your first resume to get started
cloud3.click_upload_drag: Click to upload or drag and drop
cloud3.paste_job_posting: Paste the complete job posting here...
cloud3.fill_form_insights: Fill out the form to get personalized insights
cloud3.beat_robots: How well you beat the robots
cloud3.unsaved_changes_save_before_leaving: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save before leaving?
cloud3.dropbox_benefits: Trusted cloud storage with excellent reliability and sync
cloud3.can_save_cvs_to_provider: You can now save your CVs to {{provider}}
cloud3.data_stays_in_your_provider: Your data stays in your {{provider}} account
cloud3.access_cvs_any_device: Access your CVs from any device with your {{provider}}
cloud3.cvs_automatically_saved: Your CVs are automatically saved to your {{provider}}
cloud3.connect_to_save: Connect to you provider to save you CV
